title: New: Minni Lovelle – Don’t You Forget About Me (Simple Minds Cover)
content:
Weird.

Just last night I was talking to somehow about how Don’t You (Forget About Me) is one of the greatest songs of all time, and possibly the best use of music in any film ever. Anyway. UK songstress Minni Lovelle who impressed on her debut EP last year, has reworked the 80’s classic, making it sleeker and far more refined; placing it snuggly between the likes of BANKS and Lorde, with its futuristic R&B leanings. Stream it below, and watch out for a single later this year.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
